org.springframework.batch.sample.remotepartitioning.polling

Class MasterConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.batch.sample.remotepartitioning.polling.MasterConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @EnableBatchProcessing
 @EnableBatchIntegration
 @Import(value={DataSourceConfiguration.class,BrokerConfiguration.class})
public class MasterConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This configuration class is for the master side of the remote partitioning sample. The master step will create 3 partitions for workers to process.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine
